name: ep_new_pad
description: Etherpad lite plugin to create a really new pad. It checks if a random string (between 8 and 15 characters) already exists in database. If not it will redirect the user to this page and create the pad. Call http://example.com/randomPad to create a random pad.
author: gared (STEFAN MUELLER) <stefan@stefans-entwicklerecke.de>
